title: Mercury in Aquarius
summary: A mental atmosphere favoring innovation, objectivity, and systems thinking. Ideas can be unconventional and future-focused. The opportunity is to share insights with clarity while staying open to other viewpoints.

meaning.headline: Thinking gets inventive and looks at the bigger system.

frames.text: Mercury in Aquarius highlights originality, technology, and collaborative problem-solving.
Detachment can help assess information objectively.
Networks and communities become key channels for ideas.
Being different automatically makes an idea better.

frictions: Coming across as detached or contrarian
Digging in on an idea just because it is unique

do: Explain the why behind unconventional ideas.
Blend data with empathy when communicating.
Notice when you are speaking in jargon and simplify.
avoid: Ignoring how people feel about change
Assuming online consensus equals real buy-in

reusable_lines.text: Innovate with context-let the idea serve the people involved.
Share the experiment and gather feedback before scaling.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can inspire inventive thinking and collaboration
Agency-forward language: you choose which ideas to test
Contextual framing: objectivity helps when paired with empathy

sources: Mercury as mind/communication archetype in daily cycles
